data.eml:eml: New species of Clavicornaltica Scherer (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) from continental Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konstantinov, Alexander S., Duckett, Catherine N. (2005): New species of Clavicornaltica Scherer (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) from continental Asia. Zootaxa 1037: 49-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169751
